CELL.1: Living in a couple: Married or in a registered same-sex civil partnership
CELL.3: Not living in a couple: Single (never married or never registered a same-sex civil partnership)
CELL.4: Not living in a couple: Married or in a registered same-sex civil partnership
CELL.5: Not living in a couple: Separated (but still legally married or still legally in a same-sex civil partnership)
CELL.6: Not living in a couple: Divorced or formerly in a same-sex civil partnership which is now legally dissolved
CELL.7: Not living in a couple: Widowed or surviving partner from a same-sex civil partnership
